content.body: another npm noob question: when i ran `npm install` in ecma262, it basically rewrote package-lock.json from version 1 to version 2
content.formatted_body: another npm noob question: when i ran npm install in ecma262, it basically rewrote package-lock.json from version 1 to version 2

content.body: i'm guessing i shouldn't actually commit that? am i supposed to run it with some flags? am i using the wrong version of npm?
shu: yeah, that means you are npm 7 rather than npm 6
content.formatted_body: shu: yeah, that means you are npm 7 rather than npm 6

content.body: that's fine, npm 8 is out now too
